name: Explainability (TEA-DT Health Workshop)
description: A starter file for the TEA-DT Health Workshop

goals.name: G1
goals.short_description: The outputs of the digital twin are explainable to patients.

context.name: C1
context.short_description: A clinical use case (e.g. hospital or GP surgery), where the explanation will be provided by a trained healthcare professional (e.g. consultant).

property_claims.name: P2
property_claims.short_description: The outputs are explainable to patients through verbal communication during a consultation.
property_claims.long_description: The outputs are explainable to patients through verbal communication during a consultation.

property_claims.name: P9
property_claims.short_description: The outputs are explainable to patients through visual aids (e.g., diagrams, charts).
property_claims.long_description: The outputs are explainable to patients through visual aids (e.g., diagrams, charts).

property_claims.name: P11
property_claims.short_description: The outputs are explainable to patients through written reports.
property_claims.long_description: The outputs are explainable to patients through written reports.

property_claims.name: P10
property_claims.short_description: The user interface supports timely delivery of explanations.
property_claims.long_description: The user interface supports timely delivery of explanations.

property_claims.name: P8
property_claims.short_description: The user interface is intuitive and meets the needs of the healthcare professional.
property_claims.long_description: The user interface is intuitive and meets the needs of the healthcare professional.

property_claims.name: P6
property_claims.short_description: The outputs are explainable to patients with a basic understanding of medical terms.
property_claims.long_description: The outputs are explainable to patients with a basic understanding of medical terms.

property_claims.name: P1
property_claims.short_description: The outputs are explainable to patients of varying demographics.
property_claims.long_description: The outputs are explainable to patients of varying demographics.

property_claims.name: P1.1
property_claims.short_description: The outputs are explainable to patients of varying age groups.
property_claims.long_description: The outputs are explainable to patients of varying age groups.

property_claims.name: P1.2
property_claims.short_description: The outputs are explainable to patients with different cultural backgrounds.
property_claims.long_description: The outputs are explainable to patients with different cultural backgrounds.

property_claims.name: P1.3
property_claims.short_description: The outputs are explainable to patients with different levels of education.
property_claims.long_description: The outputs are explainable to patients with different levels of education.

property_claims.name: P17
property_claims.short_description: Any uncertainty arising from the use of probabilistic techniques can be communicated appropriately to patients.
property_claims.long_description: Any uncertainty arising from the use of probabilistic techniques can be communicated appropriately to patients.

property_claims.name: P7
property_claims.short_description: The features used by the system are meaningful and intelligible to patients.
property_claims.long_description: The features used by the system are meaningful and intelligible to patients.

property_claims.name: P3
property_claims.short_description: Users are trained to explain the process behind the digital twin's development and deployment.
property_claims.long_description: Users are trained to explain the process behind the digital twin's development and deployment.

property_claims.name: P5
property_claims.short_description: The model is sufficiently interpretable by relevant users.
property_claims.long_description: The model is sufficiently interpretable by relevant users.

property_claims.name: P23
property_claims.short_description: The digital twin includes features that help users generate patient-friendly explanations.
property_claims.long_description: The digital twin includes features that help users generate patient-friendly explanations.

property_claims.name: P23.1
property_claims.short_description: The digital twin pipeline provides real-time support for users in explaining complex outputs.
property_claims.long_description: The digital twin pipeline provides real-time support for users in explaining complex outputs.

property_claims.name: P23.2
property_claims.short_description: The digital twin integrates with other tools that aid in patient communication (e.g., translation services, interactive visual aids).
property_claims.long_description: The digital twin integrates with other tools that aid in patient communication (e.g., translation services, interactive visual aids).

strategies.name: S2
strategies.short_description: Argument Over Adequate Scope of Explanations
strategies.long_description: Argument Over Adequate Scope of Explanations

property_claims.name: P4
property_claims.short_description: The {statistical model} used by the digital twin is interpretable.
property_claims.long_description: The {statistical model} used by the digital twin is interpretable.

property_claims.name: P4.1
property_claims.short_description: All features used by the {statistical model} are clinically relevant and meaningful.
property_claims.long_description: All features used by the {statistical model} are clinically relevant and meaningful.

property_claims.name: P4.2
property_claims.short_description: The {statistical model} is intrinsically interpretable (e.g., logistic regression, decision trees).
property_claims.long_description: The {statistical model} is intrinsically interpretable (e.g., logistic regression, decision trees).

property_claims.name: P4.3
property_claims.short_description: The {statistical model} uses post hoc techniques to ensure interpretability (e.g. feature importance for neural networks).
property_claims.long_description: The {statistical model} uses post hoc techniques to ensure interpretability (e.g. feature importance for neural networks).

property_claims.name: P4.4
property_claims.short_description: The user interface has clear explanations for how the input features influence the digital twin's outputs (e.g. recommendations, visualisations)
property_claims.long_description: The user interface has clear explanations for how the input features influence the digital twin's outputs (e.g. recommendations, visualisations)

property_claims.name: P21
property_claims.short_description: The process of how the digital twin was designed, developed, and deployed is explainable.
property_claims.long_description: The process of how the digital twin was designed, developed, and deployed is explainable.

property_claims.name: P21.1
property_claims.short_description: Information about the project's governance is accessible to relevant parties.
property_claims.long_description: Information about the project's governance is accessible to relevant parties.

property_claims.name: P21.2
property_claims.short_description: Information about the project's governance is sufficient to support appropriate explanations as needed.
property_claims.long_description: Information about the project's governance is sufficient to support appropriate explanations as needed.

property_claims.name: P13
property_claims.short_description: Automated explanations (or explantion-supporting information) are accurate.
property_claims.long_description: Automated explanations (or explantion-supporting information) are accurate.

property_claims.name: P13.1
property_claims.short_description: Methods for deriving explanations achieve a sufficient level of predictive consistency and reliability.
property_claims.long_description: Methods for deriving explanations achieve a sufficient level of predictive consistency and reliability.

property_claims.name: P13.2
property_claims.short_description: Methods for deriving explanations are sufficiently representative of the actual underlying architecture.
property_claims.long_description: Methods for deriving explanations are sufficiently representative of the actual underlying architecture.

property_claims.name: P14
property_claims.short_description: Data governance processes have been clearly documented.
property_claims.long_description: Data governance processes have been clearly documented.

property_claims.name: P15
property_claims.short_description: Patients can provide feedback on the explanations given, and this feedback is used to improve future explanations.
property_claims.long_description: Patients can provide feedback on the explanations given, and this feedback is used to improve future explanations.

property_claims.name: P18
property_claims.short_description: Mechanisms exist to support contestability of decisions by patients.
property_claims.long_description: Mechanisms exist to support contestability of decisions by patients.

property_claims.name: P22
property_claims.short_description: There is a mechanism to assess patient understanding after explanations are provided.
property_claims.long_description: There is a mechanism to assess patient understanding after explanations are provided.

property_claims.name: P20
property_claims.short_description: There is a mechanism to assess patient understanding after explanations are provided.
property_claims.long_description: There is a mechanism to assess patient understanding after explanations are provided.

property_claims.name: P12
property_claims.short_description: Explanations are refined based on patient feedback.
property_claims.long_description: Explanations are refined based on patient feedback.

property_claims.name: P19
property_claims.short_description: Methods for scrutinising ongoing behaviour of system are available to appropriate auditors or assessors.
property_claims.long_description: Methods for scrutinising ongoing behaviour of system are available to appropriate auditors or assessors.

property_claims.name: P16
property_claims.short_description: A clear audit trail will be established to ensure decision traceability.
property_claims.long_description: A clear audit trail will be established to ensure decision traceability.
